emerging_technologies.name: Smart Household Robots
emerging_technologies.description: Robots designed for home assistance, focusing on basic tasks like cleaning, meal preparation, and minor home repairs.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Increased independence for the elderly, potential job displacement in basic services, privacy concerns regarding in-home surveillance.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Cost, privacy concerns, perceived necessity, and technological reliability.

emerging_technologies.name: Personalized AI Health Monitoring
emerging_technologies.description: Wearable devices that integrate with AI to provide personalized health analytics and recommendations.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Shift towards preventive care, potential data privacy issues, increased health literacy.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: User trust in AI, integration with healthcare systems, data security.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural Feedback Devices
emerging_technologies.description: Devices that provide feedback to enhance focus, reduce stress, or aid in cognitive therapy.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for mental health improvement, ethical concerns about cognitive enhancement, and the digital divide.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory approval, public perception of brain technology, cost of devices.

mainstream_technologies.name: Augmented Reality (AR) in Education
mainstream_technologies.description: Widespread use of AR to enhance learning experiences in educational settings.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Integrated into school curriculums, with teachers and students using AR for interactive learning.

mainstream_technologies.name: Blockchain for Digital Identity
mainstream_technologies.description: Using blockchain to securely manage and verify digital identities for various online services.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Broadly adopted for secure online transactions and identity verification, reducing fraud.

epoch_themes.description: Technology increasingly tailored to individual needs, preferences, and lifestyles.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Enhances user experience, raises privacy concerns, and necessitates new regulations for data protection.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Aligns with trends towards personalized services, data-driven decision making, and the IoT.

epoch_themes.theme: Integration of AI in Everyday Life
epoch_themes.description: AI becomes ubiquitous in managing daily tasks, from household chores to personal health.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Improves quality of life, potential for job automation, and shifts in employment sectors.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Part of the broader trend towards automation, smart cities, and the fourth industrial revolution.
